jump_scares.spoiler: Marion runs into Jimmy who is wearing a mask
The camera cuts to the body of Jimmy who who has an ice skate attached to his face
Marion opens a door and the body of Jimmy’s friend falls on top of her
Laurie dreams of Myers breaking through a closet wall to get to her
A hand comes out from underneath the toilet cubicle door to grab a lady’s bag
Ronny is surprised by some students while on the phone. [Video]
Some kids in Halloween costumes run past Laurie, startling her
Some kids bang on the window beside Laurie which again startles her
John surprises Molly while she is walking through the dimly lit basement. [Video]
Laurie turns around and walks into Norma
Laurie opens her eyes and Will is suddenly standing right in front of her
Laurie opens the door and is surprised to see Ronny standing right there
After retrieving the corkscrew, Charlie turns around and Myers is standing right in front of him
Myers jumps out of the bushes and grabs Molly
Myers suddenly grabs a door-handle and starts hacking at the door with a knife
A bloodied Ronny leaps out and grabs Laurie as she is about to finish off Myers
